resources.string: At its zenith,\nRuled over modern : Jammu and Kashmir, Punjab, Sindh, Himachal Pradesh, Delhi NCR, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Chattisgarh, Bihar, Jharkhand, West Bengal, Bangladesh, Rajasthan, Gujarat, \nParts of (Maharashtra, Karnataka, Odisha, Telangana).

At its zenith,\nRuled over modern: Rajasthan, Haryana, Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, Pakistan, Afghanistan, \nParts of (Madhya Pradesh, Jammu and Kashmir, Tibet, China, Tajikistan).
